message: Welcome! Our product is guaranteed to be high-quality, with a success rate of 80%. Invest in something that will meet your expectations. Your satisfaction is our top priority. Let's make this purchase a win-win for both of us.

I'm not convinced by your guarantee. I'd like to see some data before making a purchase. Can you tell me the probability of the product being low-quality based on the current statistics? I'd also like to know what will happen to the product if I pass on it.

Hello! I understand your concerns. The probability of the product being low-quality is only 20% given our high-quality success rate. If you choose not to purchase, there's no obligation; the product remains available for future consideration. Trust in our quality assurance process and make an informed decision. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal.
